title: owncloud client 1.5
body:
i am able to connect to owncloud installation from my office lan network

but when i connect through internet from outside my office network
i get wrong credentials errror:

this is the log message:
12-19 08:54:59:201 socketapi:  ctor:  "\\.\pipe\" 
12-19 08:54:59:237 socketapi:  can't start server 
12-19 08:54:59:352 !!! mirall::checkserverjob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "status.php" 
12-19 08:55:00:063 status.php returns:  qmap(("edition", qvariant(qstring, "") ) ( "installed" ,  qvariant(qstring, "true") ) ( "version" ,  qvariant(qstring, "6.0.0.13") ) ( "versionstring" ,  qvariant(qstring, "6.0") ) )    0  reply:  qnetworkreplyimpl(0x4d13a18) 
12-19 08:55:00:063 ** application: owncloud found:   qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com/status.php" )   with version  "6.0" ( "6.0.0.13" ) 
12-19 08:55:00:063 !!! mirall::propfindjob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:00:063 # checking for authentication settings. 
12-19 08:55:00:079 !!! mirall::checkquotajob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:00:406 mirall::propfindjob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )" 
12-19 08:55:00:406 connection validator result:  "status not found" 
12-19 08:55:00:406 quota request *not* successful, http result code is  403 
12-19 08:55:00:406 mirall::checkquotajob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )" 
12-19 08:55:02:200 00 client update check to  "https://updates.owncloud.com/client/" 
12-19 08:55:03:433 loading config:  "c:\users\irfan.ahmed\appdata\local\owncloud/owncloud.cfg"  (url is  "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" ) 
12-19 08:55:03:433 client is on latest version! 
12-19 08:55:05:414 !!! mirall::checkquotajob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:05:773 mirall::checkquotajob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )" 
12-19 08:55:10:780 !!! mirall::checkquotajob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:11:077 mirall::checkquotajob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )" 
12-19 08:55:16:084 !!! mirall::checkquotajob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:16:365 mirall::checkquotajob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )" 
12-19 08:55:21:372 !!! mirall::checkquotajob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:21:809 mirall::checkquotajob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )" 
12-19 08:55:26:817 !!! mirall::checkquotajob created for  qurl( "https://cloud.mydomain1.com" )  querying "/" 
12-19 08:55:27:098 mirall::checkquotajob error: "error downloading https://cloud.mydomain1.com/remote.php/webdav/ - server replied: forbidden ( the server denied the specified uniform resource locator (url). contact the server administrator.  )"
